code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import{useNavigate,useParams,Link}from'react-router-dom';import styles from'./Edit.module.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Edit(){const{id}=useParams();const[title,setTitle]=useState('');const navigate=useNavigate();useEffect(()=>{fetch("http://localhost:4000/posts/".concat(id)).then(res=>res.json()).then(data=>setTitle(data.title)).catch(console.error);},[id]);const handleSubmit=e=>{e.preventDefault();fetch("http://localhost:4000/posts/".concat(id),{method:'PUT',headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'},body:JSON.stringify({title})}).then(()=>navigate('/')).catch(console.error);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:styles.container,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:styles.title,children:"Edit Post"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,className:styles.form,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"Title",value:title,onChange:e=>setTitle(e.target.value),required:true,className:styles.input}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:styles.buttons,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/",className:styles.cancel,children:"Cancel"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",className:styles.submit,children:"Save Changes"})]})]})]});}export default Edit;
